name: adolc_sparse
brief:
Convenience header for sparse derivative computation

Include this file to access all sparse derivative functionality:
- sparse_jac(): Sparse Jacobian computation
- sparse_hess(): Sparse Hessian computation
- jac_pat() / hess_pat(): Sparsity pattern detection
- Bit-pattern forward/reverse modes
see: adolc.h for main ADOL-C include (does not include sparse by default)
sparse/sparsedrivers.h for detailed sparse driver documentation
